introduction: Set in 1950's India, FERAL is a film about an English Madame who has raised two tribal sisters to be her live-in domestic servants on a withering colonial estate. But the arrival of Madame’s latest lover - a shaman scholar and his search for an ancient forest song – begins to change the alchemy of the estate, as the sisters slowly transgress – taking over the house and reclaiming their lost, wild, mystical selves.
